text: Marisa Isabel Lopes Mena (born 25 October 1984), known professionally as Mimicat, is a Portuguese pop and soul singer and songwriter. She is known in Europe for representing Portugal in Eurovision Song Contest 2023 with the song "Ai coração". She previously tried to represent Portugal at Eurovision in 2001 with the song "Mundo colorido" under the stage name Izamena, but did not win the Portuguese song selection competition. == Sources == Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:People from Coimbra
title: Mimicat
